sql.select_pptn_sql: SELECT STCD, TM, DRP, INTV FROM test.dbo.ST_PPTN_R WHERE TM > :f1<char[32]> AND TM <= :f2<char[32]> ;
sql.select_stbprp_sql: SELECT  STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAzt, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1 FROM test.dbo.ST_STBPRP_B;
